channel.title: Simple Help Needed

item.title: Simple Help Needed
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Well i’ve got this problem whilst making my latest source…It’s pretty simple i’ve got it half right…
I’ve made a command that changes your appearance to specific items.Here is what it is;

if (command.startsWith("tester")) { playerEquipment[playerHat]=3751; playerEquipment[playerCape]=14077; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585; playerEquipment[playerChest]=14638; playerEquipment[playerShield]=13601; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=1079; playerEquipment[playerHands]=7462; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=3105; playerEquipment[playerRing]= 6535; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=892; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Thats my code,it works but i have to be wearing nothing for the items i want to show up on me.I thought the

appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

would of fixed it…Obviously not.So any tips?

Read full topic
